org.mini2Dx.ui

Class UiContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.ui.element.UiElement
      • org.mini2Dx.ui.element.ParentUiElement
        • org.mini2Dx.ui.UiContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor, FlexUiElement, Hoverable

    public class UiContainer
extends ParentUiElement
implements com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor
    The container for all UI elements. update(float), interpolate(float) and render(Graphics) must be called by your GameContainer

    • Field Summary
